snippet: Sean Abbott, the Australian fast bowler who delivered the ball that killed Phillip Hughes, returned to cricket on Friday.
abstract: Sean Abbott, Australian bowler who delivered ball that killed cricketer Phillip Hughes, returns to cricket, helping New South Wales beat Queensland.
lead_paragraph: Sean Abbott, the Australian fast bowler who delivered the ball that killed Phillip Hughes, returned to cricket on Friday.

headline.main: Bowler of Fatal Cricket Ball Returns
